body_html: Is there a way to do this currently in pytorch ? I was trying to implement Minibatch discrimination(https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.03498.pdf) where I need to multiply M1(n x a) with M2(a x b x c) to get M3(n x b x c).
body_text: Is there a way to do this currently in pytorch ? I was trying to implement Minibatch discrimination(https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.03498.pdf) where I need to multiply M1(n x a) with M2(a x b x c) to get M3(n x b x c).
body: Is there a way to do this currently in pytorch ? I was trying to implement Minibatch discrimination(https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.03498.pdf) where I need to multiply M1(n x a) with M2(a x b x c) to get M3(n x b x c).
